trans-unit.source: Displays a graphic in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta um gráfico num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewImageCell class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> used to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> or an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewImageCell é um tipo especializado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>utilizado para apresentar um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>ou um <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, consoante o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A> property of a DataGridViewImageCell is set to `true` to indicate that the user cannot edit the cell contents.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A>de um DataGridViewImageCell for definida como `true` para indicar que o utilizador não é possível editar o conteúdo da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>é o tipo de coluna é especializado para armazenar as células deste tipo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is initialized to a new DataGridViewImageCell.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é inicializada para um novo DataGridViewImageCell.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To pattern the cells within a column after an existing DataGridViewImageCell, set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to the cell to use as a pattern.
trans-unit.target: Para o padrão de células na coluna após um DataGridViewImageCell existente, defina a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade à célula para utilizar como um padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades relacionadas com a célula da coluna são wrappers para as propriedades da mesma forma-com o nome da célula de modelo.

trans-unit.source: Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change.
trans-unit.target: Alterar os valores de propriedade da célula modelo irá afetar apenas células com base no modelo que são adicionadas após a alteração.

trans-unit.source: Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Alterar os valores de propriedade relacionados com a célula da coluna, no entanto, irá atualizar a célula de modelo e todos os outras células na coluna e atualize a apresentação de coluna, se necessário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref> class, configuring it for use with cell values other than <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref> classe, configurá-lo para utilização com valores de célula diferente de <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> with a `valueIsIcon` parameter value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor chama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>com um `valueIsIcon` valor do parâmetro `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref> class, optionally configuring it for use with <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> cell values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref> classe, opcionalmente, configurá-lo para utilização com <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> valores da célula.

trans-unit.source: When you use this constructor, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to the value of the `valueIsIcon` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando utiliza este construtor, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>propriedade está definida para o valor da `valueIsIcon` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valueIsIcon` parameter value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir que o canal alfa de <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>valores é pintado corretamente, utilize este construtor com um `valueIsIcon` valor do parâmetro `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: If the `valueIsIcon` parameter is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueType%2A> properties return a <xref:System.Type> object representing the <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> type.
trans-unit.target: Se o `valueIsIcon` parâmetro é `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueType%2A>Propriedades devolver um <xref:System.Type>objeto que representa o <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>tipo.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell will display an <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A célula irá apresentar um <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata esta célula.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Substitua o método de Clone sempre que derivar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>e adicione novas propriedades à classe derivada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto acessível para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se não chame o método CreateAccessibilityInstance explicitamente, este será chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Obter ou definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, tem de adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assemblagem instalada com o .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DataGridViewImageCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DataGridViewImageCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DataGridViewImageCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value that is used when creating a new row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor predefinido que é utilizado quando criar uma nova linha.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property should be of type <xref:System.Drawing.Image> or type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor desta propriedade deve ser do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Image>ou tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, consoante o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Whenever a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is displayed in which new rows can be added, the last row is an empty new row of cells loaded with default values.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>é apresentado na quais novas linhas podem ser adicionadas, a última linha é uma nova linha vazia de células carregado com valores predefinidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Override this property to provide a different default image for these cells or to return `null` to avoid displaying images.
trans-unit.target: Ignorar esta propriedade para fornecer uma imagem de predefinido diferente para estas células ou para devolver `null` para evitar a apresentar imagens.

trans-unit.source: An object containing a default image placeholder, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to display an empty cell.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém um marcador de posição de imagem predefinida, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> para apresentar uma célula vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with the image.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto associado à imagem.

trans-unit.source: You will typically provide a text description for each image cell.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, irá fornecer uma descrição de texto para cada célula de imagem.

trans-unit.source: This description provides an accessible alternative to the image.
trans-unit.target: Esta descrição forneça acessível alternativa para a imagem.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o texto de descrição é utilizado quando o valor de célula é copiado para a área de transferência.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Description%2A> property of the owning column also sets the Description property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Description%2A>propriedade da coluna proprietário também define a propriedade de descrição de cada célula da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with the image displayed in the cell.
trans-unit.target: O texto associado à imagem apresentada na célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the cell's hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controlo de edição alojada da célula.

trans-unit.source: The EditType property is always `null` because there is no associated Windows Forms control for editing an image.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EditType é sempre `null` porque não existe nenhum controlo Windows Forms associado para editar uma imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the underlying editing control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do controlo de edição subjacente.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this property is always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Conforme implementado desta classe, esta propriedade é sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do valor formatado associado a célula.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is a property is a <xref:System.Type> object representing either the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> type or the <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> type because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> can only handle graphic images.
trans-unit.target: O valor desta propriedade é uma propriedade é um <xref:System.Type>objeto que representa um o <xref:System.Drawing.Image>tipo ou o <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>tipo porque um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>só pode processar imagens de gráfico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object representing display value type of the cell, which is the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> type if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> or the <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> type otherwise.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>objeto que representa a apresentar o tipo de valor da célula, que é o <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> tipo se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*>propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> caso contrário, escreva.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and cell style.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o retângulo delimitador que encloses área conteúdo da célula, que é calculada utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> e o estilo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de gráficos para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> a aplicar à célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> bounds que o conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's error icon, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o retângulo delimitador que encloses ícone de erro da célula, se um é apresentado.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de gráficos para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> a aplicar à célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's error icon, if one is displayed; otherwise, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que bounds ícone de erro da célula, se estiver apresentado; caso contrário, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a graphic as it would be displayed in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um gráfico como será apresentado na célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo chama este método para converter um valor de célula para um valor de apresentação equivalente do tipo indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O controlo transmite o valor de célula para este método de `value` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If the `context` parameter value includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value, this method returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property for copying to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Se o `context` valor do parâmetro inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>valor, este método devolve o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>propriedade para copiar para a área de transferência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event handler can modify both `value` and `cellStyle`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>processador de eventos pode modificar tanto `value` e `cellStyle`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: If the handler does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object.
trans-unit.target: Se o processador não definido o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`, no entanto, este método formatos `value` utilizando as propriedades de formatação do `cellStyle` objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se não for bem-sucedida, a formatação do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma rotina de tratamento para este evento ou os conjuntos de processador de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`, é emitida uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is successful and the type of the formatted value matches the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property, this method returns the formatted value.
trans-unit.target: Se a formatação é efetuada com êxito e o tipo do valor formatado corresponde ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedade, este método devolve o valor formatado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns a standard error graphic in the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, este método devolve um gráfico de erro padrão do tipo indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value to be formatted.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser formatado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> in effect for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> em vigor para a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> associated with the value type that provides custom conversion to the formatted value type, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no such custom conversion is needed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref> associadas com o tipo de valor que fornece a conversão personalizada para o tipo de valor formatado ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> não se é necessária nenhuma conversão essa personalizado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> associated with the formatted value type that provides custom conversion from the value type, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no such custom conversion is needed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref> associadas com o tipo de valor formatado, que fornece personalizado conversão do tipo de valor, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> não se é necessária nenhuma conversão essa personalizado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values describing the context in which the formatted value is needed.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"> </xref> valores que descrevem o contexto em que o valor formatado é necessário.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the formatted image.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa a imagem formatada.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o tamanho preferencial, em pixels, da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizada para desenhar a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero de linha da célula.

trans-unit.source: The cell's maximum allowable size.
trans-unit.target: Tamanho máximo permitido a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho preferencial, em pixels, da célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: The value contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor contido no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the graphics layout for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o esquema de gráficos para a célula.

trans-unit.source: Changing this property will cause the cell to redraw itself.
trans-unit.target: A alteração desta propriedade fará com que a célula redesenhar-se automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ImageLayout%2A> property of the owning column also sets the ImageLayout property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ImageLayout%2A>propriedade da coluna proprietário também define a propriedade ImageLayout de cada célula da coluna e atualiza a apresentação de coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref> for this cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref> para esta célula.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref> value is invalid.
trans-unit.target: O fornecido <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref> valor é inválido.

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desenha atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para a célula de pintura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que tem de ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que contém os limites da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valores que especifica o estado da célula.

trans-unit.source: The data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados formatados da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem de erro que está associada a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que contém informações de formatação e estilo sobre a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que contém os estilos do limite para a célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valores que especifica que as partes da célula tem de ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that describes the current object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que descreve o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this cell displays an <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se esta célula apresenta um <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir que o canal alfa de <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>valores é pintado corretamente, defina esta propriedade como `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueType%2A> properties return a <xref:System.Type> object representing the <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> type.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade é `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueType%2A>Propriedades devolver um <xref:System.Type>objeto que representa o <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>tipo.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property of the owning column also sets the ValueIsIcon property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>propriedade da coluna proprietário também define a propriedade ValueIsIcon de cada célula da coluna e atualiza a apresentação de coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property changes for a cell in the row for new records, the image displayed in the cell is updated to the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor desta propriedade é alterado para uma célula na linha de novos registos, a imagem apresentada na célula é atualizada para o valor atual do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property, the cell ValueIsIcon property does not automatically update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the associated cell style when you change its value.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário da coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>propriedade, a propriedade ValueIsIcon da célula não atualizar automaticamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>propriedade de estilo de célula associado quando alterar o respetivo valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you change the cell ValueIsIcon property value to `true`, be sure to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> property to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: Quando altera o valor da propriedade ValueIsIcon da célula como `true`, certifique-se definir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>propriedade para um <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> válido</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you change the ValueIsIcon property value to `false`, be sure to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Quando altera o valor da propriedade ValueIsIcon para `false`, certifique-se definir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>propriedade para um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> válido</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this cell displays an <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se esta célula apresenta um <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> valor; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data type of the values in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de dados dos valores existentes na célula.

trans-unit.source: When retrieving this property, if the ValueType for the cell has not been set, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for the owning column is used, if it exists.
trans-unit.target: Ao obter esta propriedade, se não tiver sido definido ValueType para a célula, em seguida, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para a coluna proprietário é utilizada, caso exista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If no owning column exists, the default value type is used, which is the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> type if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `false` and the <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> type otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Se não existe nenhuma coluna proprietário, o tipo de valor predefinido é utilizado, o que é o <xref:System.Drawing.Image>tipo se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>propriedade está definida como `false` e o <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>caso contrário, escreva.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> is the actual data object contained in the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>é o objeto de dados real contido na célula, enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>propriedade é a representação formatada deste objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ValueType and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O ValueType e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedades correspondem aos tipos de dados destes valores, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the cell's value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do valor da célula.</xref:System.Type>
